summary:
Harry Potter is a popular book series by J.K. Rowling about a young wizard, Harry, and his friends at Hogwarts School. The story follows Harry's battle against the evil Lord Voldemort, who wants to rule the wizard world. The books are full of fantasy, adventure, and magic, with themes like friendship, good vs. evil, and prejudice.

There are seven books in the series, which has become a global phenomenon, selling over 600 million copies. It has also inspired movies, theme parks, and spin-off stories, making it one of the most successful media franchises.
title: Harry Potter
